pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 15  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 0    $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Passive     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Not natural    $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)They are healed by $(l:brewing/effects#instant_damage)$(thing)Instant Damage$() and harmed by $(l:brewing/effects#instant_health)$(thing)Instant Health$() effects, are immune to $(l:brewing/effects#regeneration)$(thing)Regeneration$() and $(l:brewing/effects#poison)$(thing)Poison effects$().
